item.title: 梅西百货因关税不确定性下调年度利润预期
item.description: 梅西百货公司（Macy's）周三下调了年度利润预期，因为这家美国顶级百货公司正在应对关税引发的不确定性，以及在服装和配饰方面的谨慎消费。【原文：Macy's cut its annual profit forecast on Wednesday as the top U.S. department store operator navigates tariff-led uncertainty and cautious spending on apparel and accessories.】

item.title: Michael Kors 母公司卡普里下调年度收入预期
item.description: 迈克尔-科尔斯公司（Michael Kors）的所有者卡普里控股公司（Capri Holdings）周三下调了2026年的收入预期，表明与关税相关的不确定性正在拖累北美和亚洲市场对其皮革手袋和配饰本已脆弱的需求。【原文：Michael Kors-owner Capri Holdings cut its revenue forecast for 2026 on Wednesday signaling that tariff-related uncertainty was weighing on an already fragile demand for its leather handbags and accessories in North America and Asia.】

item.title: 加拿大国家银行第二季度利润因金融市场业务强劲而增长
item.description: 加拿大国家银行周三公布第二季度利润增长，得益于其金融市场部门的强劲表现。【原文：National Bank of Canada reported a rise in second-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by a robust performance in its financial markets units.】

item.title: Honeywell expected to add Elliott's Marc Steinberg to board, WSJ reports
item.description: Honeywell is expected to appoint Marc Steinberg, a partner at activist Elliott Investment Management, to its board later on Wednesday, the Wall Street Journal reported.

item.title: Who is Remy Cointreau's new CEO, Franck Marilly?
item.description: French wines and spirits company Remy Cointreau announced on Wednesday that Franck Marilly will replace CEO Eric Vallat who resigned earlier this year.

item.title: Minutes of Fed's May meeting likely to show officials grappling with uncertainty
item.description: The U.S. Federal Reserve at its May 6-7 meeting undercut expectations that it would change its policy interest rate anytime soon, and minutes from that session released on Wednesday may show just how firmly policymakers are holding onto their current wait-and-see approach.

item.title: VIEW Stellantis CEO's appointment reactions
item.description: Automaker Stellantis on Wednesday named Antonio Filosa, the Italian head of its North American operations, as its CEO, effective from June 23.

item.title: Brazil airline Azul files for Chapter 11 to restructure high debt
item.description: Brazilian airline Azul filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in the United States, it said in a securities filing on Wednesday, despite months of efforts to restructure mostly pandemic-era debt.

item.title: US banks tiptoe toward crypto, awaiting more green light from regulators
item.description: Big U.S. banks are holding internal discussions about expanding into cryptocurrencies as they get stronger endorsements from regulators, but initial steps will be tentative, centering on pilot programs, partnerships or limited crypto trading, according to four industry executives. Wall Street giants that had been largely blocked from many crypto activities by strict regulations are poised to grow quickly.

item.title: Ex-analyst sues Freepoint Commodities, alleges pressure to facilitate insider trading
item.description: A former senior analyst at U.S. trading company Freepoint Commodities has sued the company, alleging that top executives pressured employees to facilitate insider trading and retaliated against employees that objected.

item.title: Exclusive: Amazon's in-car software deal with Stellantis fizzles
item.description: Amazon's deal with Stellantis to create in-car software that the companies hoped would transform the driving experience while bolstering their vehicle-tech credentials is "winding down," the companies confirmed after a Reuters inquiry.

item.title: 诺基亚与 Blackned 将为德国军队开发下一代战术网络
item.description: 芬兰诺基亚公司和德国莱茵金属公司（Rheinmetall）控股的国防技术公司 blackned 周三表示，两家公司将为德国武装部队联合开发下一代战术网络。【原文：Finland's Nokia and defence technology firm blackned, majority-owned by Rheinmetall , will jointly develop next-generation tactical networks for the German armed forces, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 印尼反垄断机构发现 TikTok 收购 Tokopedia 存在垄断风险
item.description: 印尼反垄断机构周三表示，去年 TikTok 收购印尼最大电子商务平台 Tokopedia 的交易存在垄断风险。【原文：Indonesia's antitrust agency said on Wednesday that last year's takeover of the country's biggest e-commerce platform Tokopedia by TikTok carried a risk of monopoly.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局称福特在美国召回超过 100 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周三表示，福特汽车公司将在美国召回1,075,299辆汽车，原因是后视摄像头可能无法显示图像，从而增加了车祸风险。【原文：Ford Motor is recalling 1,075,299 vehicles in the United States over an issue that may prevent the rearview camera from displaying images increasing the risk of a crash, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 捷克称中国是部委遭网络攻击的幕后黑手并召见大使
item.description: 捷克共和国周三表示，中国应对针对外交部用于非机密通信的网络的 "恶意网络活动 "负责，并召见中国大使谴责这一事件。【原文：The Czech Republic said on Wednesday China was responsible for a "malicious cyber campaign" targeting a network used for unclassified communication at the Foreign Affairs ministry, and summoned the Chinese ambassador to condemn the incident.】

item.title: 美股期货大幅反弹后回落，关注英伟达财报
item.description: 由于投资者关注人工智能风向标英伟达（Nvidia）即将发布的财报和贸易方面的发展，美国股指期货在前一交易日大幅反弹后于周三下滑。【原文：U.S. stock index futures slipped on Wednesday after a sharp rally in the previous session, when easing tariff tensions boosted sentiment, as investors focused on AI bellwether Nvidia's upcoming earnings and developments on the trade front.】

item.title: 意大利经济部长表示，如果在意大利联合信贷银行-BPM 协议问题上遭到违抗，他将辞职
item.description: 意大利经济部长吉安卡洛-乔盖蒂（Giancarlo Giorgetti）周三表示，如果政府在联合信贷银行竞购较小银行 Banco BPM 时附加的 "金权 "条件被否决，他将辞职。【原文：Italian Economy Minister Giancarlo Giorgetti said on Wednesday he would resign if he were overruled on "golden power" conditions the government has tied to UniCredit's bid for smaller bank Banco BPM .】

item.title: 联合国劳工组织在经济放缓之际下调全球就业预测
item.description: 由于全球经济前景恶化和贸易紧张局势，联合国劳工组织周三将今年全球就业增长预期下调至1.5%。【原文：The United Nation's agency for labour on Wednesday cut its global employment forecast for job growth this year to 1.5% due to a worsening global economic outlook and trade tensions.】

item.title: 在网络攻击被归咎于中国后，欧盟声援捷克共和国
item.description: 在捷克认定中国对捷克外交部的 "恶意网络攻击 "负有责任后，欧盟声援捷克。【原文：The European Union stands in solidarity with the Czech Republic, after the Czech Republic identified China as being responsible for a "malicious cyber campaign" at the Czech Ministry of Foreign Affairs.】

item.title: 销售、中国和美国关税：Stellantis 新老板面临的挑战
item.description: 继卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）于 12 月离职后，安东尼奥-菲洛萨（Antonio Filosa）于周三被任命为汽车制造商 Stellantis 的首席执行官。【原文：Antonio Filosa was appointed chief executive of automaker Stellantis on Wednesday, following the departure of Carlos Tavares in December.】

item.title: 欧洲央行发言人称拉加德决心完成任期
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）曾与欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）就提前离职以领导世界经济论坛（World Economic Forum）一事进行过谈判，欧洲中央银行周三表示，克里斯蒂娜-拉加德决心完成其八年的欧洲中央银行行长任期。【原文：Christine Lagarde is determined to complete her eight-year term as president of the European Central Bank, the ECB said on Wednesday after the Financial Times reported that she held talks about leaving early to lead the World Economic Forum.】

item.title: 独家报道飞机租赁巨头呼吁特朗普扩大飞机零关税协议
item.description: 全球最大飞机租赁公司的负责人呼吁美国总统唐纳德-特朗普重新谈判并扩大飞机行业的免税贸易协定，将中国等新加入者纳入其中，这也是贸易战的一个新的游说转折点。【原文：The head of the world's largest aircraft leasing company has called on U.S. President Donald Trump to renegotiate and expand a duty-free trade agreement for the aircraft industry to include newcomers like China in a new lobbying twist to the trade war.】

item.title: 独家报道内部邮件显示：日产向美国员工提供买断，停止全球加薪
item.description: 路透社查阅的内部邮件显示，日本日产汽车公司已开始向美国工人提供收购，并暂停在全球范围内根据业绩加薪。【原文：Japan's Nissan has started offering buyouts to U.S. workers and has suspended merit-based wage increases worldwide, internal emails reviewed by Reuters showed, as the automaker expands cost cuts amid weak performance in key markets.】

item.title: 智利 SQM 公司利润未达预期，锂价持续承压
item.description: 智利的 SQM 公司是全球第二大锂生产商，该公司周三的季度利润未达预期，并警告说，由于对电动汽车电池至关重要的金属供应过剩，下一季度的实现价格将下降。【原文：Chile's SQM , the world's second-largest lithium producer, on Wednesday missed quarterly profit estimates and warned of lower realized prices in the next quarter due to oversupply of the metal that is crucial for electric vehicle batteries.】

item.title: Taiwan trims 2025 GDP growth forecast, cites US tariff uncertainty
item.description: Taiwan's trade-reliant economy is expected to grow at a slower pace in 2025 than previously forecast, as uncertainty over possible U.S. tariffs weighs on growth, the statistics agency said on Wednesday.

item.title: 利润和收入创历史新高，中国小米股价大涨
item.description: 小米公司周三公布了创纪录的第一季度收入和利润，并称其从智能手机向家电等高端产品的转型已见成效，小米股价一度大涨 3.4%。【原文：Xiaomi shares jumped as much as 3.4% on Wednesday after it reported record first-quarter revenue and profit and said its shift towards higher-end products from smartphones to home appliances was already paying off.】

item.title: 从实习生到首席执行官：吉普车制造商 Stellantis 的新老板 Antonio Filosa
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 周三表示，已任命其北美业务的意大利籍负责人 Antonio Filosa 担任首席执行官，自 6 月 23 日起生效。【原文：Carmaker Stellantis has appointed Antonio Filosa, the Italian head of its North American operations, as its chief executive, effective from June 23, it said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，伦敦首次公开募股受阻后，申银万国正努力争取在香港上市
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，Shein 正在努力争取在香港上市，因为这家在线快速时尚零售商拟在伦敦进行的首次公开募股（IPO）未能获得中国监管机构的批准。【原文：Shein is working towards a listing in Hong Kong after the online fast-fashion retailer's proposed initial public offering (IPO) in London failed to secure the green light from Chinese regulators, said three sources with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: GlobalData 延长 ICG 收购期限，结束与 KKR 的收购谈判
item.description: 英国 GlobalData 公司周三将私募股权公司 ICG 提出明确收购要约的最后期限延长至 6 月 11 日，同时结束了与 KKR 的谈判，双方未能就收购条件达成协议。【原文：Britain's GlobalData on Wednesday extended the deadline to June 11 for private equity firm ICG to make a firm takeover offer, while ending talks with KKR after failing to reach an agreement on terms.】

item.title: Robinhood 在英国推出桌面交易，瞄准经验丰富的散户投资者
item.description: 总部位于美国的在线经纪商 Robinhood 周三表示，正在将其桌面平台扩展到英国，以扩大其在寻求更复杂交易工具的散户投资者中的影响力。【原文：U.S.-based online brokerage Robinhood said on Wednesday it was expanding its desktop platform into the UK to extend its reach among retail investors looking for more sophisticated trading tools.】
